column5: Anyone know if there is going to be a ban on lead jig heads? Thanks!
Other than Provincial Parks, it does not appear to be imminent.
IT IS NOT A PROBLEM OR A CURRENT ISSUE IN ONTARIO!
Thanks guys, just wondering if this went any further than the rumors I had heard....
It seems to have been put on the back burner for now...we'll see what happens in the next session of parliament....
Actually lead jigs are allowed in Ontario Provincial Parks but banned in Canadian National parks.
Quite correct..it is National Parks, not Provincial...my apologies!
